headline: /economy/regionalaccounts/timeseries/qwnd
lede: Regional Accounts are accounts for regions, sub‐regions and local areas produced according to the same concepts and definitions used in the UK National Accounts.  In the economic accounts the economy is split into institutional sectors, that is, groupings of units according broadly to their role in the economy. The main sectors are non‐financial corporations, financial corporations, general government, households and non‐profit institutions serving households.
name: Regional Accounts
